feed.title: [Opt-in full-RBF] Zero-conf apps in immediate danger

entry.title: [Opt-in full-RBF] Zero-conf apps in immediate danger
entry.summary: In an email exchange on October 21, 2022, Sergej Kotliar questioned the accuracy and necessity of a proposed method for detecting conflicting transactions. The details of the proposed method were not provided in the exchange. Peter Todd, whose email signature indicates affiliation with petertodd.org, was also included in the email thread but did not respond to Kotliar's question. No further information is available from the context provided.
